snippet: Viewers around the world wondered how targeting a popular children’s character could be a vote-winner.
abstract: Viewers around the world wondered how targeting a popular children’s character could be a vote-winner.
lead_paragraph: After Mitt Romney appeared to suggest that the beloved “Sesame Street” character Big Bird was surplus to requirements in Wednesday’s debate, viewers around the world wondered how targeting a popular children’s character could be a vote-winner.

headline.main: Romney’s Threat to Big Bird Sows Confusion Abroad
